statements: SELECT * FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT robot_model, maintenance_description FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%battery%';
SELECT * FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_model FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE robot_model = 'R2-D2';
SELECT robot_id, robot_model, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE robot_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT robot_model, COUNT(robot_id) as total_maintenance FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY robot_model ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC
SELECT DISTINCT robot_model FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%oil%' ORDER BY robot_model ASC
SELECT robot_id, robot_model, maintenance_description FROM RobotMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'TechBot Industries';
SELECT model_name, year_of_manufacture FROM robot_models ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) FROM robot_models GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM robot_models WHERE year_of_manufacture BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'RoboTech' ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla' AND year_of_manufacture > 2020;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM robot_models WHERE year_of_manufacture < 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer != 'Honda' AND year_of_manufacture BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Regular Inspection' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RobotModels;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM RobotModels ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT model_name FROM RobotModels WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM RobotModels;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM RobotModels WHERE model_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(model_id) AS max_id FROM RobotModels;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM MaintenanceTeams ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, status FROM RobotModels INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON RobotModels.model_id = MaintenanceSchedules.model_id WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Robots;
SELECT robot_name, model_name FROM Robots WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
SELECT technician_name, experience_years FROM Technicians ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, cost FROM Robot_Models WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT robot_name, schedule_date, maintenance_type FROM Robots INNER JOIN Maintenance_Schedules ON Robots.robot_id = Maintenance_Schedules.robot_id;
SELECT * FROM Robots ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC, robot_name ASC
SELECT robot_name, model_name FROM Robots WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE

SELECT r.robot_name, m.model_name, s.schedule_date FROM Robots r INNER JOIN Maintenance_Schedules s ON r.robot_id = s.robot_id INNER JOIN Robot_Models m ON r.model_name = m.model_name WHERE s.maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' ORDER BY s.schedule_date DESC
SELECT t.technician_name, t.technician_specialty, t.experience_years FROM Technicians t WHERE t.certification = TRUE ORDER BY t.experience_years DESC

SELECT r.robot_name, m.manufacturer, rs.schedule_date, t.technician_name FROM Robots r INNER JOIN Maintenance_Schedules rs ON r.robot_id = rs.robot_id INNER JOIN Robot_Models m ON r.model_name = m.model_name INNER JOIN Technicians t ON rs.technician_name = t.technician_name WHERE m.cost > 1000
SELECT * FROM robot_models;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM robot_models WHERE manufacturer = 'RoboCorp';
SELECT robot_id, model_id, date_acquired FROM robots ORDER BY date_acquired DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, robot_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM robot_maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM robot_models ORDER BY manufacturer DESC, year_of_manufacture ASC;

SELECT r.robot_id, r.date_acquired, m.model_name, m.manufacturer, s.schedule_id FROM robots r JOIN robot_models m ON r.model_id = m.id JOIN robot_maintenance_schedules s ON r.robot_id = s.robot_id WHERE r.robot_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY r.date_acquired DESC;

SELECT rm.model_name, rs.maintenance_type, rs.maintenance_date, rs.technician_name FROM robot_models rm JOIN robots r ON rm.id = r.model_id JOIN robot_maintenance_schedules rs ON r.robot_id = rs.robot_id WHERE rs.technician_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY rs.maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT rt.robot_id, rt.date_acquired, rt.warranty_expiry, t.task_name, t.task_description FROM robots rt JOIN maintenance_tasks t ON rt.robot_id = t.task_id WHERE rt.warranty_expiry IS NOT NULL AND rt.warranty_expiry < NOW();

SELECT l.log_id, l.robot_id, l.log_date, rm.manufacturer, rm.year_of_manufacture, r.date_acquired FROM robot_logs l JOIN robots r ON l.robot_id = r.robot_id JOIN robot_models rm ON r.model_id = rm.id WHERE r.date_acquired > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY l.log_date DESC;
